com.twitter.heron.simulator.instance

Class BoltOutputCollectorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.instance.AbstractOutputCollector
      • com.twitter.heron.instance.bolt.BoltOutputCollectorImpl
        • com.twitter.heron.simulator.instance.BoltOutputCollectorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IErrorReporter, IOutputCollector

    public class BoltOutputCollectorImpl
extends BoltOutputCollectorImpl
implements IOutputCollector
    BoltOutputCollectorImpl is used by bolt to emit tuples, it contains: 1. IPluggableSerializer serializer, which will define the serializer 2. OutgoingTupleCollection outputter. When a tuple is to be emitted, it will serialize it and call OutgoingTupleCollection.admitBoltTuple() to sent it out.

    It will handle the extra work to emit a tuple: For data tuples: 1. Set the anchors for a tuple 2. Pack the tuple and submit the OutgoingTupleCollection's addDataTuple 3. Update the metrics

    For Control tuples (ack & fail): 1. Set the anchors for a tuple 2. Pack the tuple and submit the OutgoingTupleCollection's addDataTuple 3. Update the metrics
